title: Assistant Equipment Room Manager - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Equipment Room Manager Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: The Assistant Equipment Room Manager is responsible for performing operations involving athletic equipment for one or more assigned sport programs.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
